description: This Python script demonstrates creating an AI voice interaction agent using the Agno framework, capable of processing audio input and generating voice responses. It includes setup of the agent, fetching an example audio file, running analysis, and saving the response audio.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured for voice and text interactions, utilizing OpenAI models and media processing.

classes.name: Audio
classes.description: Represents audio content, including data and format information.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models, configured for multimodal input.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent to process input and generate responses, including audio output.
